sentence.Network_en: The use of the split infinitive is now generally acceptable.
sentence.Network_cn: 分裂不定式的用法现在已被广泛接受.

sentence.Network_en: Modal verbs generally take the bare infinitive.
sentence.Network_cn: 情态动词通常用不带to的不定式.

sentence.Network_en: In English an infinitive is often used with the word " to ".
sentence.Network_cn: 英语中,不定式往往与 " to " 字连用.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 不定式(Infinitive)                                  过去式(Past Tense)                                               过去分.
非谓语动词不定式（infinitive）I.基本形式：“to+动词原形”。有时to可省略。
与不定词(infinitive)连用时的分别例一︰She hopes to get a job overseas.她希望找个海外的工作 -- 意为她有此强烈的意愿并极有可能.
人教版•九年级英语词汇表(附音标) - 豆丁网 ... polluted 被污染的 infinitive 不定式，动词原形 suitable 合适的，适宜的.

list.abs: 死循环(Infinite Loop)：是一个永不终止的循环。语法错误(Syntax Error)：是由于拼错一条命令或使用不正确的语法引起的一种错误。
Liran - 博客园 ... Independent Set 独立集 infinite loop 无限循环 infinite recursive 无限递归.
有哪些动漫好看？_百度知道 ... 新世纪福音战士( EVA) 无限斯特拉托斯( Infinite Stratos) 超时空要塞( MACROSS F).
二、无限序列(Infinite Sequence)  设函数f之定义域N为所有自然数时,则称f为一无限序列,由于其函数值可以依序而列出为f(1),f(2), …f(n), …,且其.
SAT数学词汇_百度文库 ... decimal fraction 纯小数 infinite decimal 无穷小数 recurring decimal 循环小数.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as an adjective): from Latin infinitivus, from infinitus (see infinite). The noun dates from the mid 16th cent

entry.tran: (动词)原形,不定式(前面常加 to)
entry.def: The infinitive of a verb is the basic form, for example 'do', 'be', 'take', and 'eat'. The infinitive is often used with 'to' in front of it.

means.word_mean: 1. the uninflected form of the verb
2. not having inflections to indicate tense
